timeline.bodyText:
This is very counter-intuitive...
I'd rather iterate through the recipeList and filter out the non-matching architecture.
In a nutshell, I think we could do
recipeList
.filter(matchArch(platform.getArch))
.filter(matchOS(platform.getOs))
.sort(byOsRank())
.findFirst()

timeline.bodyText: We can now use Enum here. With @Builder.Default = ALL. so that we don't have to deal with null case specially.

timeline.bodyText:
In this case, the architecture should be NOT_RECOGNIZED which isn't ALL.
Because ALL is a requirement, it's technically not an architecture. But NOT_RECOGNIZED is one, which could satisfy All as a requirement.
